title: The Bakhtiari migration
creator_credit: Anthony Howarth, David Koff, Anthony-David Productions and Films Incorporated
brief_description: An excellent record of one of the most hazardous feats of human endurance still undertaken. Shows the way in which half a million people together with millions of valuable sheep, goats, mules and dogs, struggle for five weeks to make the two hundred mile crossing of the Zagros mountains, South Iran.
